20110126054632.000|20110126054633.000|CC1|   [ Male Announcer ] If you've 
20110126054633.000|20110126054634.000|CC1|   had a heart attack caused by 
20110126054634.000|20110126054638.000|CC1|   a completely blocked artery, 
20110126054638.000|20110126054638.000|CC1|  another heart attack could be 
20110126054638.000|20110126054640.000|CC1|   lurking, waiting to strike.  
20110126054640.000|20110126054640.000|CC1|          A heart attack        
20110126054640.000|20110126054642.000|CC1|     that's caused by a clot,   
20110126054642.000|20110126054644.000|CC1|     one that could be fatal.   
20110126054644.000|20110126054646.000|CC1|   But PLAVIX helps save lives. 
20110126054646.000|20110126054646.000|CC1|        PLAVIX, taken with      
20110126054646.000|20110126054648.000|CC1|      other heart medicines,    
20110126054648.000|20110126054648.000|CC1|      goes beyond what other    
20110126054648.000|20110126054650.000|CC1|    heart medicines do alone,   
20110126054650.000|20110126054650.000|CC1|  to provide greater protection 
20110126054650.000|20110126054652.000|CC1|       against heart attack     
20110126054652.000|20110126054654.000|CC1|     or stroke and even death   
20110126054654.000|20110126054654.000|CC1|            by helping          
20110126054654.000|20110126054656.000|CC1|     to keep blood platelets    
20110126054656.000|20110126054656.000|CC1|      from sticking together    
20110126054656.000|20110126054658.000|CC1|   and forming dangerous clots. 
20110126054658.000|20110126054658.000|CC1|         Ask your doctor        
20110126054658.000|20110126054701.000|CC1|   if PLAVIX is right for you.  
20110126054701.000|20110126054701.000|CC1|      Protection that helps     
20110126054701.000|20110126054704.000|CC1|           save lives.          
20110126054704.000|20110126054706.000|CC1|     Certain genetic factors    
20110126054706.000|20110126054706.000|CC1|       and some medicines,      
20110126054706.000|20110126054707.000|CC1|        such as Prilosec,       
20110126054707.000|20110126054709.000|CC1|   reduce the effect of PLAVIX  
20110126054709.000|20110126054709.000|CC1|   leaving you at greater risk  
20110126054709.000|20110126054711.000|CC1|   for heart attack and stroke. 
20110126054711.000|20110126054711.000|CC1|       Your doctor may use      
20110126054711.000|20110126054713.000|CC1|          genetic tests         
20110126054713.000|20110126054714.000|CC1|     to determine treatment.    
20110126054714.000|20110126054714.000|CC1|     Don't stop taking PLAVIX   
20110126054714.000|20110126054717.000|CC1|  without talking to your doctor
20110126054717.000|20110126054717.000|CC1|   as your risk of heart attack 
20110126054717.000|20110126054719.000|CC1|     or stroke may increase.    
20110126054719.000|20110126054719.000|CC1|  People with stomach ulcers or 
20110126054719.000|20110126054721.000|CC1|  conditions that cause bleeding
20110126054721.000|20110126054723.000|CC1|      should not use PLAVIX.    
20110126054723.000|20110126054723.000|CC1|       Taking PLAVIX alone      
20110126054723.000|20110126054725.000|CC1|  or with some other medicines, 
20110126054725.000|20110126054725.000|CC1|        including aspirin,      
20110126054725.000|20110126054727.000|CC1|   may increase bleeding risk,  
20110126054727.000|20110126054727.000|CC1|       so tell your doctor      
20110126054727.000|20110126054729.000|CC1|      when planning surgery.    
20110126054729.000|20110126054729.000|CC1|         Tell your doctor       
20110126054729.000|20110126054731.000|CC1|     all medicines you take,    
20110126054731.000|20110126054731.000|CC1|  including aspirin, especially 
20110126054731.000|20110126054733.000|CC1|     if you've had a stroke.    
20110126054733.000|20110126054733.000|CC1|  If fever, unexplained weakness
20110126054733.000|20110126054736.000|CC1|      or confusion develops,    
20110126054736.000|20110126054737.000|CC1|    tell your doctor promptly.  
20110126054737.000|20110126054739.000|CC1|    These may be signs of TTP,  
20110126054739.000|20110126054739.000|CC1|      a rare but potentially    
20110126054739.000|20110126054741.000|CC1|   life-threatening condition,
